rows.label: qst005602_msg001
rows.name: Excuse me! Could I ask you something?

rows.label: qst005602_msg002
rows.name: Yes yes? What big voice for?

rows.label: qst005602_msg003
rows.name:
I heard that you might have an ancient
tome that mentions something about
an ancient tablet.

rows.label: qst005602_msg004
rows.name: Could I have a look at it?

rows.label: qst005602_msg005
rows.name: Rogirogi have many tomes like that.

rows.label: qst005602_msg006
rows.name:
Need more information about
tablet you interested in.

rows.label: qst005602_msg007
rows.name:
Well, it's transparent, really thin,
and floats in the air.

rows.label: qst005602_msg008
rows.name: ...You sure that really tablet?

rows.label: qst005602_msg009
rows.name:
Of course! It's clearly packed full
of ancient information!

rows.label: qst005602_msg010
rows.name:
Thin and floating in air...?
Ahh!

rows.label: qst005602_msg011
rows.name:
Rogirogi do remember seeing picture
like that in tome!

rows.label: qst005602_msg012
rows.name: Perfect! Could we take a look at it?

rows.label: qst005602_msg014
rows.name:
You're charging us just to
look at it?

rows.label: qst005602_msg015
rows.name:
Tome was not easy to get hands on.
Very valuable item!

rows.label: qst005602_msg016
rows.name:
If not willing to pay, Rogirogi suggest
friends leave.

rows.label: qst005602_msg017
rows.name:
Well, I guess it was a bit naive of us to
expect you to show us such a valuable
text for free. Rex, what do you think?

rows.label: qst005602_msg018
rows.name: Whaaaaa?!

rows.label: qst005602_msg019
rows.name: Friends bring money this time?

rows.label: qst005602_msg021
rows.name:
Always pleasure doing business!
Here is tome you asked for.
Look all you like!

rows.label: qst005602_msg022
rows.name:
Hmm... This definitely seems to be a
picture of the tablet we found.

rows.label: qst005602_msg023
rows.name:
It's just covered in weird writing,
though. How are we meant to read
any of this?

rows.label: qst005602_msg024
rows.name: Don't worry, I can take care of that!

rows.label: qst005602_msg025
rows.name: What does it say?

rows.label: qst005602_msg026
rows.name:
...It looks like this is an explanation
of how that tablet works.

rows.label: qst005602_msg027
rows.name:
The text's pretty faded, so there are
quite a few bits I can't read...

rows.label: qst005602_msg028
rows.name:
But there was a bit that said
"XE36". It seemed to be part
of the tablet's name.

rows.label: qst005602_msg029
rows.name:
The tablet has a name?
That's pretty weird.

rows.label: qst005602_msg030
rows.name:
Hang on, Shiki!
What if that isn't a name...

rows.label: qst005602_msg031
rows.name: Ohhh!

rows.label: qst005602_msg032
rows.name:
It could be part of the 12-character
code we're looking for!

rows.label: qst005602_msg033
rows.name: Nice work, Shiki!

rows.label: qst005602_msg034
rows.name: I don't have that kind of money...

rows.label: qst005602_msg035
rows.name: Whaaaat?!

rows.label: qst005602_msg036
rows.name:
Wait right here,okay?
We'll fetch the money in a jiffy!

rows.label: qst005602_msg037
rows.name: I'm counting on you, Rex!

rows.label: qst005602_msg038
rows.name: Why meeeee?!

rows.label: qst005602_msg039
rows.name: Pay

rows.label: qst005602_msg040
rows.name: Don't pay
